founder.description: A person who founded this organization.

parentOrganization.description: The larger organization that this organization is a branch of, if any.

sameAs.description: URL of a reference Web page that unambiguously indicates the item's identity. E.g. the URL of the item's Wikipedia page, Freebase page, or official website.

image.description: An image of the item. This can be a URL or a fully described ImageObject.

foundingDate.description: The date that this organization was founded.

duns.description: The Dun & Bradstreet DUNS number for identifying an organization or business person.

additionalType.description: An additional type for the item, typically used for adding more specific types from external vocabularies in microdata syntax. This is a relationship between something and a class that the thing is in. In RDFa syntax, it is better to use the native RDFa syntax - the 'typeof' attribute - for multiple types. Schema.org tools may have only weaker understanding of extra types, in particular those defined externally.

hasOfferCatalog.description: This is a generated, and simplified, variant of https://schema.org/OfferCatalog. I has been interpreted as a plain array, this behaviour is hard-coded to the itemList types and should be improved.

contactPoint.description: A contact point for a person or organization.

isicV4.description: The International Standard of Industrial Classification of All Economic Activities (ISIC), Revision 4 code for a particular organization, business person, or place.

founders.description: A person who founded this organization.

aggregateRating.description: The overall rating, based on a collection of reviews or ratings, of the item.

taxID.description: The Tax / Fiscal ID of the organization or person, e.g. the TIN in the US or the CIF/NIF in Spain.

event.description: Upcoming or past event associated with this place, organization, or action.

member.description: A member of an Organization or a ProgramMembership. Organizations can be members of organizations; ProgramMembership is typically for individuals.

foundingLocation.description: The place where the Organization was founded.

location.description: The location of for example where the event is happening, an organization is located, or where an action takes place.

mainEntityOfPage.description:
Indicates a page (or other CreativeWork) for which this thing is the main entity being described.

See background notes for details.

events.description: Upcoming or past events associated with this place or organization.

seeks.description: A pointer to products or services sought by the organization or person (demand).

description.description: A short description of the item.

numberOfEmployees.description: The number of employees in an organization e.g. business.

brand.description: The brand(s) associated with a product or service, or the brand(s) maintained by an organization or business person.

owns.description: Products owned by the organization or person.

award.description: An award won by or for this item.

dissolutionDate.description: The date that this organization was dissolved.

department.description: A relationship between an organization and a department of that organization, also described as an organization (allowing different urls, logos, opening hours). For example: a store with a pharmacy, or a bakery with a cafe.

awards.description: Awards won by or for this item.

subOrganization.description: A relationship between two organizations where the first includes the second, e.g., as a subsidiary. See also: the more specific 'department' property.

makesOffer.description: A pointer to products or services offered by the organization or person.

hasPOS.description: Points-of-Sales operated by the organization or person.

serviceArea.description: The geographic area where the service is provided.

potentialAction.description: Indicates a potential Action, which describes an idealized action in which this thing would play an 'object' role.

naics.description: The North American Industry Classification System (NAICS) code for a particular organization or business person.

memberOf.description: An Organization (or ProgramMembership) to which this Person or Organization belongs.

areaServed.description: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided.

legalName.description: The official name of the organization, e.g. the registered company name.

vatID.description: The Value-added Tax ID of the organization or person.

contactPoints.description: A contact point for a person or organization.

globalLocationNumber.description: The Global Location Number (GLN, sometimes also referred to as International Location Number or ILN) of the respective organization, person, or place. The GLN is a 13-digit number used to identify parties and physical locations.
